title: Sentinels of Numenor (2C37)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make a [Gondor] companion strength +2 (or +4 if in a fierce skirmish).
Lore:	”…they still preserved through the suns and rains of forgotten years the mighty likenesses in which they had been hewn.”
Rarity:	C
